headline: STRASBAUGH SINGLE SIDED LAPPING MACHINE
categories.lvl2: Surface Processing Equipment  >  Lapping Machines > Single Sided Lapper
specstable:
Manufacturer Strasbaugh
Model 6BPDC
Description Single Sided Lapping Machine
Plate Diameter 20.00 in (50.80 cm)
Plate Thickness 2.00 in (5.08 cm)
Number of Conditioning Rings 3
Ring Inside Diameter 6.00 in (15.24 cm)
Plate Speed Variable Yes
Plate Speed 90 RPM
Plate Drive 2.00 HP
Slurry System Yes
Pneumatic Pressure Arms Yes
Operating Air Pressure 60.00 PSI (413,718.00 N/sq m)
Other Information Ring offset: 9/16"
Spindle torque: 1700 in/lbs
Spindle load rating: 1050 lbs.
Push button reset interval timer
Powered ring attachment
Digital tachometer
Air pressure system with individual control at each station
Lap tables have vacuum chucks with individual control
Engis Model EM-1 slurry dispensing system:
  • Microprocessor based circuitry
  • Digital readout
  • Interval cycles up to 999 seconds (16.65 minutes)
  • Spray duration of 1 to 9 seconds in 1 second increments
  • 115 volt
Power Requirements 208 V 14.0 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Year of Manufacture 1994
Condition Excellent
Exterior Dimensions
Width 38.000 in (96.5 cm)
Depth 28.000 in (71.1 cm)
Height 64.000 in (162.6 cm)
Weight 994 lb (451 kg)
